title: Help I am a new user!
body: Okay so I am a brand new member of LoL and I am trying to actually download the game itself, but midst downloading it keeps saying update failed check logs and I don't know what to do at this point. If it helps to know I am using Windows 8.1, save a life.

replies.body: Welcome to League, stranger!  I'd like to help you out and get this fixed up, so you can start playing some matches!  To do that, I'll need some more information to figure out what's happening.  When you get update failed, is it happening at a specific %?  Also, your client may not have installed properly so I recommend starting out by downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform a clean reinstall.  Run the tool and let me know the results as well!
